metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2419 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3 isaffected. Safari before 10.1 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit"component. It allows remote attackers to bypass a Content Security Policyprotection mechanism via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2419` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.16.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.16.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.16.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.16.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.16.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.16.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.1-1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
